alert.note: Alert for Northern Saratoga; Northern Warren; Northern Washington; Southeast Warren; Southern Washington (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 20 at 1:20PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A BAND OF HEAVY SNOW WILL AFFECT PARTS OF NORTHERN WASHINGTON... SOUTHERN WASHINGTON...SOUTHEAST WARREN...NORTHERN WARREN...AND NORTHERN SARATOGA COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A band of heavy snow accompanied by winds of up to 30 MPH which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than one mile. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 119 PM EST, a band of heavy snow was over Lake Luzerne Campground, or near Lake George Village moving east at 35 MPH. THIS BAND OF HEAVY SNOW WILL BE NEAR... Lake George Village around 130 PM EST. Glens Falls, Glens Falls North and West Glens Falls around 135 PM EST. Hudson Falls and Fort Edward around 140 PM EST. This includes Interstate 87 between exits 18 and 22. SAFETY INFO... Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this band of heavy snow. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads may lead to accidents. &&

area.areaDesc: Northern Saratoga; Northern Warren; Northern Washington; Southeast Warren; Southern Washington
